comment._content: Montessori Schools are still good beginnings for lots of kids, provided they are run as she designed them, a lot of individual creativity. Some educators have remained skeptical. I read her "Discovery of the Child" years ago and found it to be very interesting. Of course, today little kids learn to use computers and that has opened new doors for them that Montessori could never have imagined. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Montessori_method
